data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 23,636 believers in Balrampur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary: On average, 174 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Balrampur a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 2,098,993 lost people in  Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Brahmin Rikhisur people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Brahmin Rikhisur people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Brahmin Rikhisur people is yours.
Father, we ask for 429 new simple churches in the county of Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 2,148,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Balrampur
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria (Hindu traditions), Gadaria (Muslim traditions), Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Sanadhya, Rajput Amethiya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gadaria (Hindu traditions) (6,571,000), Gadaria (Muslim traditions) (3,800), Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions) (400), Brahmin Sanadhya (2,706,000), Rajput Amethiya (26,000)
